tasks.description: Validate all JSON files in memory-bank, plans, and routines against referenced schemas.
Create identity.md and checklist.md for each active agent in agents-spec/
Test fallback handling and pipeline resilience in agent simulations.
Add test module to validate docbot routine execution and snapshot diff logging.
Implement utility to convert memory-bank feedback into roadmap or checklist patches.
Generate trust-index.json linking agents to simulation results, checklist coverage, and reflection history.
